snippet: The Syrians and Russians appear to be mobilizing to apply a kill-all-who-resist strategy to their most ambitious target yet....
abstract: Signs that Syrian government and Russia are mobilizing to retake rebel-held sections of Aleppo draws protest at United Nations; Aleppo would be largest target yet of government's scorched-earth strategy of emptying cities via bombardment and starvation.

byline.original: By ANNE BARNARD and SOMINI SENGUPTA
byline.contributor: Anne Barnard reported from Beirut, and Somini Sengupta from New York. Reporting was contributed by Maher Samaan from Paris, Hwaida Saad from Beirut, Karam Shoumali from Istanbul and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: The Syrians and Russians appear to be mobilizing to apply a kill-all-who-resist strategy to their most ambitious target yet.

headline.main: Syria and Russia Appear Ready to Scorch Aleppo
headline.print_headline: Ferocious New Strikes in Aleppo Ignite Caustic Exchange at U.N.
